channel.title: CVE Feed for Veertu -- Anka Build
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Veertu -- Anka Build

item.title: CVE-2024-39755|2024-10-03T15:16:10.308Z -- veertu -- anka%20build
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the Veertu Anka Build 1.42.0. The vulnerability occurs during Anka node agent update. A low privilege user can trigger the update action which can result in unexpected elevation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-41922|2024-10-03T15:16:09.668Z -- veertu -- anka%20build
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the log files download functionality of Veertu Anka Build 1.42.0. A specially crafted HTTP request can result in a disclosure of arbitrary files. An attacker can make an unauthenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-41163|2024-10-03T15:16:10.932Z -- veertu -- anka%20build
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the archive download functionality of Veertu Anka Build 1.42.0. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to a disclosure of arbitrary files. An attacker can make an unauthenticated HTTP request to exploit this vulnerability.
